channel.title: [PRE-DEV] RPGW - www.freewebs.com/rpgwdev
channel.description:
[size=16pt][center][glow=red,2,300][b]www.freewebs.com/rpgwdev[/b][/glow][/center][/size]
Well, since Mopar's dev section is down, I thought I'd come here to see what you people think. I am currently in the development of a new server - named RPGW - which is a themed server. It will be mainly based around 1 empty island in Runescape, an undiscovered island (It's not on the map ;) ). I am currently in the process of getting my object adder to work, and when it is up and running, I will create a brand new city on this island. The game will actually have a storyline, which I will set out a bit like a super-huge-giant quest.
[B][STORYLINE][/B]
You begin in a small town called -INSERTNAMEHERE-, where you know everybody in the town. This town has a castle, however you have never been inside the castle, it is guarded by the King's Knights, and the gates are constantly closed. You have tried to look through the gate, but can only see the beginning of the castle's walls, and know nothing of whats inside. This town has a small farm, forest and pond, along with some houses and stalls. One of the houses, the "Forbidden" house, is very mysterious. Inside lives a strange old man with lots of secrets.
During your adventure, you will come in contact with this man, and also other people in your small town. You will have the chance to visit the castle, and be sent on important quests involving huge monsters that will take a warrior to beat. And have the chance to get rare items from such monsters.
Well into your adventure, you will also discover new lands, with new people, new towns, shops and monsters. The adventure is completely up to you, but in order to get to new places, different places, you will need to continue the set quest.
[B][/STORYLINE][/B]
As you can see, there are still a lot of things to be detirmined. However, I did manage to draw up a quick outline of the first town.
[IMG]http://img207.imageshack.us/img207/9062/map1eq7.jpg[/img]
Post your thoughts of this here.
~ Budda
[glow=red,2,300]----------------------------------- The above is what has been posted on other sites. ----------------------------------- Below is what has happened since -----------------------------------[/glow]
Right. Well after posting this on Rs-Server, everyone has said it is a good idea. Many people have also offered to help. The main developers of this game will be me (obviously), Diablo1123 and Sythdel (old admin on BuddaScape). Sythdel hasn't got internet till Wednesday-ish, so I will start off making the first town (Pic above) using some command Diablo has made. We have decided to go with a sql server, - which is Diablo's area of expertise, so I will be leaving everything in that area up to him - because it has proved to be a better choice to add in objects, i.e. making a new town. When Diablo eventually replies to me on MSN, I/we will start this, and then the game will finally be underway.
After the first town is mapped, or while we're doing it, I will make Sythdel do all the minor coding to the client. Such as changing the starting location, taking out all the spells, changing some button names and shit.
I am expecting to have the first (Alpha) stage complete by...October maybe? This will be done when a couple of towns have been made, NPCs mapped, the buttons changed and the start of the main quest done, with maybe some minor quests on the side. As you can see, this is a big project, so the October date is not definite, just an outline. In Alpha testing, the client to the server will be given out to a select few people (no ip needed to memorize) and I will also obfuscate the client, and shove all the class files into a jar, so (hopefully) the IP of the server will be hidden so nobody else can come in. The select few people will be friends of developers, to see what the server is like, and maybe a few others. [b]Please DO NOT reply saying "Can I please be an Alpha tester?!?!?!?!" as I will just spit on you, poke your eyes out using matches, then eat them...>.>.[/b]
I will try to keep you updated with whats going on, such as screenshots of towns made, items and NPCs and everything.
~ Budda
P.S. Post here what you think of the plans.[br][size=1]Posted at: August 28, 2006, 01:13:34 AM[/size][hr]Anyone?

item.description:
@defyboy wrote:

[quote=“lawl, post:1, topic:11654”][quote author=defyboy link=topic=16912.msg195070#msg195070 date=1156864286]

i know your objects are spawned, im in general how to turn the ugly stupid cache into something useful and be able to repack it

I will post my repacker once ive finished my general set of tools, But it only works for the new engine type of cache. (You have to recalculate all of the CRC’s)
[/quote]

lol ive done a lot of looking into the cache stuff and the unpacked files… of course nothing makes sense cause its a bunch of boring bytes but you can see a list of all the items etc… but why are you making a packer for the new engine if theres no private servers for it anyway… and theres no point editing stuff for real rs. one more thing whats a crc :P[/quote]

There is a private server, look at my sig…

If you dont know what a CRC is, your probably in over your head with this idea you have. You could always http://www.justfuckinggoogleit.com

Read full topic

item.title: [PRE-DEV] RPGW - www.freewebs.com/rpgwdev
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

Right, well I need help from somebody who knows what they are doing, as everyone I ask just replies with short ass replies, and not explaining, or just laughing at me (xero :@).

Anyways, since we can’t find a good flat place, or the ground tiles, I ahve decided to do the whole of it on the black space of RuneScape, and the ground will just have to be black until we can find the code (Even though some believe that it can’t be done(?)). And since people can’t walk on the black space without no-clip, I need to make another walkable area. I know what I want to do, something along the lines of:

if (absX >= #### && absY >= ####) { setWalkableArea(); }

However, I have no idea what I can put in the setWalkableArea void, and I don’t know where I would put the above code. So I will most likely end up doing the void, with the area defined in it, and add in the void (walkableArea() under process().
If anyone could help me with this, point me in the right direction for what I should put in the void, then I’ll kiss your feet or something. I’ll…(I KNOW!)…I’ll let you in the Alpha Testing stage :p.

Help Please!

~ Budda[br][size=1]Posted at: August 29, 2006, 05:50:32 AM[/size][hr]PS. The new cache that DanieB is talking about will be included in this servers client, even though it will be obfuscated (But I’m pretty sure you could still get it out).

Read full topic
